element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm merges a set of vector layers.
The attributes table is defined by a main layer. For each field, if the other layers to be merged have a field with the same name, its values will be used. Otherwise, the feature will have a blank value for that field. Field that exist in any of the layers to be merged but not in the main layer will not be used and will not appear in the resulting layer.

element.name: LAYERMAIN
element.text: The main input layer. Its attributes table will be used to define the attributes table of the resulting layer.

element.name: LAYERS
element.text: The set of layer to be merged with the main one.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer containing all the features from all the input layers.
